title: The primary or main route of evacuation is via the upper por…
caption_en: The primary or main route of evacuation is via the upper portion of the Cabin Entry Door. A secondary or alternate route is through the emergency exit hatch.

title: Having decided on an emergency landing which could require a…
caption_en: Having decided on an emergency landing which could require an evacuation, the commander will communicate his intention to all crew and passengers if any.

title: Check that all loose items are stowed away.
caption_en: Check that all loose items are stowed away.

title: Prepare to remove the First Aid kit if required.
caption_en: Prepare to remove the First Aid kit if required.

title: If passengers are carried, relocate passengers closer to exi…
caption_en: If passengers are carried, relocate passengers closer to exits if neccessary.

title: Point out the exits and brief them on the opening procedure.
caption_en: Point out the exits and brief them on the opening procedure.

title: Check that passenger seats are locked facing forward, seat b…
caption_en: Check that passenger seats are locked facing forward, seat backs are upright and that all passengers have their seat belts fastened.

title: The person assigned to do the cabin check is to advise the c…
caption_en: The person assigned to do the cabin check is to advise the commander when the cabin checks are completed.

title: The commander shall issue the brace command at feet before t…
caption_en: The commander shall issue the brace command at feet before touchdown. Brace Brace

title: If passengers are carried, open exits and supervise evacuati…
caption_en: If passengers are carried, open exits and supervise evacuation.

title: Check that the cabin is clear, remove First Aid kit and torc…
caption_en: Check that the cabin is clear, remove First Aid kit and torchlights if required and evacuate.

title: Assemble passengers away from the aircraft.
caption_en: Assemble passengers away from the aircraft.

title: In the event of a ditching, remove the raft and launch from …
caption_en: In the event of a ditching, remove the raft and launch from a suitable exit.

title: Check that the cabin is clear, remove First Aid kit and torc…
caption_en: Check that the cabin is clear, remove First Aid kit and torchlights if required.

title: If passengers are carried, supervise boarding of the raft af…
caption_en: If passengers are carried, supervise boarding of the raft after launching.
